overview: On the shore of the Angara River, two old, lonely people met - a man and a woman. They found their happiness, and would have lived like this until their death, but the great construction project, designed to turn the Hangar into a giant source of electricity, separates them. The film won the Prize as the best short film at the Open Documentary Film Festival "Russia" (Yekaterinburg).
title: Great Rivers of Siberia. Angara
